728606f-a.title: Richmond: Bloomfield Road - Bloomfield Avenue
728606f-a.text:
Bloomfield Road (Chelsea Road), west side, between Bloomfield
Ave. and River Road, showing the C. Merritt house (James Butler map,
1853). It was later the J. Bush house.
September 1923.
By Wm. T. Davis through P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
728606f-a.folder: Bloomfield Road & Bloomfield Avenue, Staten Island, NY
